Eric Schmidt will act as an advisor to Page and Sergey Brin . We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, Eric Schmidt said in a press release.
